Guests may consult with a chef or special diets trained Cast Member before placing an order. We use reasonable efforts in our sourcing, preparation and handling procedures to avoid the introduction of the named allergens into these menu choices. While we take steps to prevent cross-contact, we do not have separate allergy-friendly kitchens and are unable to guarantee that a menu item is completely free of allergens. Allergy-friendly offerings are reliant on supplier ingredient labels. We cannot guarantee the accuracy of the contents of each food item. Allergen advisory statements (e.g., “may contain") are not regulated and therefore not taken into consideration when developing allergy-friendly meals. Item.Name: Tusker House Restaurant
Item.Content:
Tusker House Restaurant in Africa, Disney's Animal Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Tusker House Restaurant

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002686.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Join Safari Donald Duck and friends at this colorful Harambe marketplace eatery for a wild Character Dining experience at breakfast and lunch, or set up camp later in the day and explore a family-focused buffet brimming with African flavor. Please note: Beginning March 8, 2015, Disney Characters will join Guests for dinner too.
WDWNT says...
My favorite buffet in all of Walt Disney World. A great mix of safe, familiar options and more diverse African fare. Breakfast and lunch also have characters.
  Cuisine: African/American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Yak & Yeti™ Local Food Cafes
Item.Content:
Yak & Yeti™ Local Food Cafes in Asia, Disney's Animal Kingdom, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Yak & Yeti™ Local Food Cafes

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/241676.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Hungry after your Himalayan trek? Tempt your taste buds with a feast of Asian fare—teriyaki beef bowls, roasted vegetable couscous wraps, egg rolls, fried rice and more. Kids’ meals, desserts, beers and other beverages are also available.
WDWNT says...
Great counter service! I really enjoy both the honey and orange chicken. They serve large portions and also surprisingly good fries. They are skinny fries instead of the usual Disney fries.
  WDWNT recommends this!
  Cuisine: American/Asian
